name: attendance_scanner
description: QR code based attendance with SQLite, Express, Firebase Auth, and Braintree

scripts.deploy: npm run glitch && npm run fire && git checkout main
scripts.glitch: git checkout master && git pull origin main --no-rebase --no-edit && git push glitch --force && git push origin master --force
scripts.predeploy: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo 'Please commit your changes before deploying' && exit 1)
scripts.predev: open http://localhost:3000 || start chrome "http://localhost:3000" || google-chrome 'http://localhost:3000' || echo 'Could not open browser automatically. Please open http://localhost:3000 manually'
scripts.test: DB_FILE=:memory: node -r dotenv/config --test --experimental-test-coverage --test-reporter=spec --test-reporter=tap --test-reporter-destination=stdout --test-reporter-destination=tap.info && npm run badges
